meanings.definition: A type of wildflower with yellow petals and white tips.
meanings.sent1: In the field, we spotted beautiful tidytips blooming.
meanings.sent2: The tidytips added a lovely touch of color to the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The tidytips seemed to be showing off their pretty white tips.
meanings.sent4: Among the sea of green, the tidytips stood out like little bursts of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the tidytips for their delicate white tips.

meanings.sent1: The tidytips flourished in the California soil.
meanings.sent2: Many people admire the beauty of the native tidytips.
meanings.sent3: The tidytips in California must feel like the local celebrities.
meanings.sent4: The tidytips, like Californians, thrive in the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The tidytips symbolize the natural charm of California.

meanings.definition: A flower commonly found in meadows and grasslands.
meanings.sent1: The meadow was filled with colorful tidytips.
meanings.sent2: Children love to pick the pretty tidytips in the grasslands.
meanings.sent3: The tidytips in the meadow seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The tidytips danced in the wind like joyful little fairies.
meanings.sent5: The sweet fragrance of the tidytips lingered in the grasslands.
